title: Bug 104630 - Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
OB: Upon connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear in the Data Explorer view.
EB: Expect column icons to be displayed in the Data Explorer view when connected to a Derby database.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Generate a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
